name: Lumira Appointments Application Generic
description: REst  API calls in Lumira Appointments Application

requests.name: Get appointments by user and dates
requests.description:
// sjain

Get appointments for a userId (patient mpi) between a begin and an end date

date format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ

E.g : 2017-02-09T00:00:00 (All Dates in UTC time)
             
https://lotus.lumiradx.com/lumira-appointments/users/87514bde-6580-48ff-8193-e5ca3f1559d6/appointments?beginDate=2012-10-01T09:45:00.000Z&endDate=2017-10-10T09:45:00.000Z

headers.name: Cache-Control
headers.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The mime type of this content

headers.name: Date
headers.description: The date and time that the message was sent

headers.name: Expires
headers.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

headers.name: Pragma
headers.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

headers.name: Transfer-Encoding
headers.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

headers.name: X-Content-Type-Options
headers.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

headers.name: X-Frame-Options
headers.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

requests.name: Delete User unavailbility ( SOAP API)
requests.rawModeData:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.soap.businesslayer.drs.kirona.com">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ser:processUnavailabilityWorkflow>
         <ffaSession>402848f85be65c7e015be696420a0042</ffaSession>
         <processUnavailabilityWorkflowParameter id="1" suspendJobs="forceJobs">
            <!--Optional:-->
            <unavailabilityWorkflowItems>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
               <unavailabilityWorkflowItem itemId="1" workerId="sue_austin" mode="delete" periodStart="2017-05-01T23:59:59" periodEnd="2017-05-10T23:59:59" reasonComment="Personal days off."/>
               <unavailabilityWorkflowItem workerId="sue_austin" mode="delete"  reasonComment="In a conference out of town." periodStart="2017-04-24T23:59:00" periodEnd="2017-04-28T23:59:00" />
                    <unavailabilityWorkflowItem workerId="sue_austin" mode="delete" reasonComment="In a conference out of town." periodStart="2017-04-24T23:59:00" periodEnd="2017-04-28T23:59:00" />
                    <unavailabilityWorkflowItem workerId="sue_austin" mode="delete" reasonComment="In a conference out of town." periodStart="2017-04-24T23:59:00" periodEnd="2017-04-28T23:59:00" />
                    <unavailabilityWorkflowItem workerId="sue_austin" mode="delete" periodStart="2017-04-28T17:00:00" periodEnd="2017-04-28T20:00:00" />
            </unavailabilityWorkflowItems>
         </processUnavailabilityWorkflowParameter>
         <executeAsynchronously>false</executeAsynchronously>
      </ser:processUnavailabilityWorkflow>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

requests.name: Create  User unavailbility ( SOAP API)
requests.rawModeData:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.soap.businesslayer.drs.kirona.com">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ser:processUnavailabilityWorkflow>
         <ffaSession>402848f85be65c7e015be696420a0042</ffaSession>
         <processUnavailabilityWorkflowParameter id="1" suspendJobs="forceJobs">
            <!--Optional:-->
            <unavailabilityWorkflowItems>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
               <unavailabilityWorkflowItem itemId="1" workerId="rufino.rabin@lumiradx.com" mode="ADD" reason="Training" periodStart="2017-04-24T23:59:59" periodEnd="2017-04-28T23:59:59"  reasonComment="In a conference out of town.">
               </unavailabilityWorkflowItem>
            </unavailabilityWorkflowItems>
         </processUnavailabilityWorkflowParameter>
         <executeAsynchronously>false</executeAsynchronously>
      </ser:processUnavailabilityWorkflow>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

Get Schedule  ( REST API)
requests.rawModeData:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.soap.businesslayer.drs.kirona.com">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ser:getSchedule>
         <ffaSession>402848f85b185e1e015b1b8d1b9303c7</ffaSession>
         <getScheduleParameter id="0" workerId="raffy.lotus@lumiradx.com" beginDate="2017-01-07T00:00:00"  endDate="2017-04-28T23:59:59" withTerminated="true" withCanceledJobs="true" >
         </getScheduleParameter>
      </ser:getSchedule>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

requests.name: Get User Unavailabilities (REST API)
Open Session  - Login  ( SOAP API)
Create user Unavailabilities ( REST API)
Update Job Status ( SOAP API)
requests.rawModeData:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.soap.businesslayer.drs.kirona.com">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ser:updateJobStatus>
         <ffaSession>402848f85b0e1165015b108293e703fb</ffaSession>
         <updateJobStatusParameter id="0" jobId="J1284" status="canceled" >
         	<requiredAssignments>
               <requiredAssignment scheduleItemId="J1284" >
                 <!--Optional based on the delay in Start time of a visit. -->
                 <globalPeriod start="2017-03-25T22:13:00" end="2017-03-25T22:13:00"/>
                 	</requiredAssignment>
                 		</requiredAssignments>
         </updateJobStatusParameter>
      </ser:updateJobStatus>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
